DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether high-protein ( 24 % total calorie protein ) enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient ( eg , ω-3 fatty acid antioxidant ) enrich β-glucan stimulates immune function compare standard enteral nutrition ( control : 20 % total calorie protein ) high-protein ( 24 % total calorie protein ) enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient without β-glucan critically ill patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Immune-enhancing Enteral Nutrition Immunomodulation Critically Ill Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether high-protein ( 24 % total calorie protein ) enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient ( eg , ω-3 fatty acid antioxidant ) enrich β-glucan stimulates immune function compare standard enteral nutrition ( control : 20 % total calorie protein ) high-protein ( 24 % total calorie protein ) enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient without β-glucan critically ill patient . In randomized double-blind placebo-controlled study , 30 patient consume 1 3 enteral nutrition : control , enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient enrich β-glucan ( 250mg/L ) enteral nutrition immune modulate nutrient without β-glucan . Enteral nutrition initiate within 24 hour ICU admission continue ICU stay 7 day .
DOC.criteria: ICU patient ICU patient could receive enteral nutrition
